ValidationRule.description: The home and visitor teams must be different teams
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(AND(NOT( ISBLANK( VisitorBrackets_Team__c ) ),NOT( ISBLANK( HomeBrackets_Team__c ) )),HomeBrackets_Team__c = VisitorBrackets_Team__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Team 1 and Team 2 must be different
